# Public Health Environmental Surveillance Evaluation Framework (PHES-EF)

*An international consensus study to develop an evaluation framework for public health environmental surveillance*
:::
\

::: centered_content
Welcome to the PHES-EF study website, where we engage global expertise to establish a consensus-driven, open-science approach for evaluating wastewater-based surveillance. We aim to collaboratively define the most robust practices for assessing this emerging public health surveillance tool.
:::
